## Emoji

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:100:
.
<p>💯</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:gb:
.
<p>🇬🇧</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:people_holding_hands:
.
<p>🧑‍🤝‍🧑</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:scotland:
.
<p>🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:emoji_doesnt_exist:
.
<p>:emoji_doesnt_exist:</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:family_man_boy_boy:
.
<p>👨‍👦‍👦</p>
````````````````````````````````
